title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' 2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5.
OB: When performing the 'copy package' operation in the Package viewer of project A, the resulting package 'xx' unexpectedly contains a package called 'ui'.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project named 'xxx'. 2. In the Package viewer, select a package in project A. For example, from the context menu, choose 'copy'. 4. Follow the on-screen instructions.
